hero.title: Innovation with Integrity
hero.subtitle: European manufacturing for professional nail brands, private label partners, and distributors worldwide.

sections.whySubtitle: We combine scientific formulation, strict European compliance and creative support to build strong nail brands.
sections.manufacturingText: All products are developed and manufactured in the EU under Cosmetic Regulation (EC) 1223/2009, GMP and Cruelty Free standards.
sections.privateLabelText: From formulation selection to packaging and artwork, we support you at every step to launch or grow your own professional nail brand.
sections.distributorsText: We are actively seeking long-term distribution partners in selected territories who share our values and growth mindset.

about.heroSubtitle: European expertise in professional UV/LED gel systems and private label manufacturing.
about.missionText: To develop high-performance, safe and reliable professional nail systems that support the growth of salons, brands and distributors.
about.valuesIntegrity: Integrity in every formula, process and partnership.
about.valuesInnovation: Continuous innovation based on science, testing and market feedback.
about.valuesPartnership: We believe in long-term, transparent relationships with our clients.

products.heroSubtitle: Professional UV/LED gel systems manufactured in the European Union.
products.intro: We manufacture a complete system of gel polishes, builders, bases, tops, preps and complementary products for professional use.
products.privateLabelNote: All systems are available for our own brands and for private label clients, subject to minimum order quantities.

privateLabel.heroSubtitle: Create your own professional gel brand with our full manufacturing and support.
privateLabel.overviewText: We provide compliant formulations, packaging options, artwork support and documentation so you can focus on building your brand and sales.
privateLabel.step1Text: We understand your target market, positioning and product needs.
privateLabel.step2Text: Choose from our approved ranges; we provide samples for testing.
privateLabel.step3Text: Select bottles, jars and components; we coordinate with your designer or assist with artwork.
privateLabel.step4Text: We manufacture under GMP with full batch tracing and documented QC.
privateLabel.step5Text: We provide the required documentation and support you as your brand grows.

brands.heroSubtitle: Discover our in-house professional systems and brand families.
brands.intro: We develop and manufacture complete product lines that can be distributed as-is or used as a reference for private label concepts.

distributors.heroSubtitle: Partner with us to bring professional EU-made gel systems to your market.
distributors.intro: We are looking for committed distributors who understand the professional beauty market and want to build a long-term brand.
requirementsList: Established business in beauty, cosmetics or professional nail care.
Existing distribution network or retail presence in your territory.
Commitment to represent our brands professionally and ethically.
Ability to meet minimum order quantities and maintain stock levels.
Willingness to provide market feedback and collaborate on growth strategies.
distributors.ctaText: Contact us with details about your business, territory and experience, and we will get back to you.

certificates.heroSubtitle: Thermitek Ltd and Leeukopf Laboratories operate under strict European regulations and internationally recognised standards.
certificates.intro: Below you can view our key certifications. Click any document to enlarge. Images are blurred where necessary to protect sensitive information.

faq.heroSubtitle: Answers to common questions about our manufacturing, private label services and compliance.
faq.contactHint: If you do not find what you are looking for, please contact us and we will be happy to help.
